name: Ask Chip
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Ask Chip is your go-to Personal A.I. Assistant. Ask $CHIP anything, and he will answer you! The cool part about $CHIP is that he's always learning. The more you interact with him, the more he learns. $CHIP can help you make a 5-Day workout plan or even help you with your homework. Whatever you need, $CHIP is there to help!
$CHIP will be free-to-use until we implement a holders subscription based + possibly a monthly payment subscription-based as well.
With $CHIP, if we're about to capture just 1% of the market share, you can already gauge how much that is in dollar amount.
